data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense attack through Fred. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Yago Felipe for Fluminense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Fluminense.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a first change, with Andre replacing the possibly injured Yago Felipe.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hudson for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 12, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Goal! Fluminense have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Luiz Henrique.
Danilo Barcelos instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Tiago (Ceara) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 17, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 18, Free kick Fluminense.
At Estadio do Maracana, Pedro Naressi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ceara's Fabinho breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 21, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Ceara.
Throw-in Fluminense.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
At Estadio do Maracana, Digao for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Rafael Sobis (Ceara) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Fluminense.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick in a good position for Ceara!
Vinicius Goes of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 37, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ceara are pushing forward but Leo Chu's finish is wide of the goal.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards Ceara a goal kick.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a Ceara throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In the minute 40, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In Rio de Janeiro, Rafael Sobis of Ceara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 42, It's now 1-1 thanks to an own goal from Hudson.
Luiz Henrique for Fluminense drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 44, Rafael Sobis (Ceara) has received a first yellow card.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Fluminense.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a Ceara throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Ceara drives forward and Vinicius Goes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Leo Chu is back on the pitch.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio do Maracana.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Leo Chu.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Caio Paulista replacing Hudson.
Ceara are coming forward and Leo Chu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 49, Charles is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Charles has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Fluminense's area.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior blows against Ceara's Fabinho for offside.
In the minute 54, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Fluminense's Igor Juliao has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 56, Important block from the Fluminense defence as Fernando Sobral fires in a strike for Ceara.
Vinicius Goes for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leo Chu gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in Fluminense.
In the minute 64, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Ceara.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 67, Marcos Paulo is replacing Luiz Henrique for the home team.
The home team replace Nene with Ganso.
In the minute 68, Ceara's Vinicius Goes is on target but unsuccessful.
Fluminense's Caio Paulista has run offside.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Rafael Sobis with Cleber Bomfim. This is the first substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
Ceara make their second substitution with Leandro Carvalho replacing Pedro Naressi.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In Rio de Janeiro, Digao (Fluminense) misses the target with a header.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Fluminense.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vinicius Goes puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
In the minute 81, Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a third substitution, with Vinicius Lima replacing Vinicius Goes.
Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca is replacing Leo Chu for Ceara at Estadio do Maracana.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Ceara.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Andre (Fluminense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Ceara.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Felippe Cardoso is replacing Andre for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 86, Free kick Ceara.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a Fluminense throw-in in Ceara's half.
Fernando Sobral (Ceara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Ceara just outside Fluminense's area.
Ceara drive upfield and Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Danilo Barcelos grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Estadio do Maracana.
Great play from Fred to set up the goal.
